results.name: a(1) = 0 and for n > 1, a(n) = 1 if Stern polynomial B(n,x) is irreducible, 0 otherwise.
comment: Characteristic function for A186891 (apart from term 1, which is here defined as a(1) = 0).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: \\ After _Charles R Greathouse IV_'s code for A186891.
xref: Differs from A010051 for the first time at n=25: here a(25) = 1.
Differs from A257000 for the first time at n=65: here a(65) = 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 20 2017
